name: Basic Set
description: A basic set of cards to try out a range of game mechanics. Includes one-per-deck Hero cards that provide permanent abilities for a high cost.

cards.name: Hivequeen Ngaat
cards.text: When you summon an [Earth] creature, draw a card.

cards.name: Sage Brennas
cards.text: Whenever you draw a card, you may instead <search> for a card. Do not reveal it.

cards.name: Ash Sprite
cards.text: If you <burn> this card, summon it and draw a card.

cards.name: Carnivorous Fern
cards.text: <Ready>.

cards.name: Enchanted Pebbles
cards.text: You may only play this card if you have cast an [Earth] spell this turn.

cards.name: Forest Sprite
cards.text: Your other [Earth] creatures cannot be targeted by your opponent's spells.

cards.name: Peach Sapling
cards.text: When this enters the battlefield, draw a card.

cards.name: Evolving Shrub
cards.text: [Earth] spells you cast targeting this cost nothing.

cards.name: Mana Sapper
cards.text: When this creature damages an opponent, exile the top card of their mana pool to draw a card.

cards.name: Relentless Eagle
cards.text: The first time this creature is destroyed, resummon it.

cards.name: Spore-Infested Boar
cards.text: When this is destroyed by combat damage, <search> for an [Earth] creature.

cards.name: Sand Elemental
cards.text: When this enters the battlefield, destroy a spell or item.

cards.name: Ash Golem
cards.text: Whenever this creature would take damage, it takes 1 less damage. If you <burn> this card, summon it.

cards.name: Ash Elemental
cards.text: When this enters the battlefield, draw a card.

cards.name: Awakened Oak
cards.text: When your opponent casts a spell for which this is a valid target, the spell must target this.

cards.name: Earth Spiritsinger
cards.text: Whenever you summon an [Earth] creature, <search> for an [Earth] spell.

cards.name: Blighted Druid
cards.text: If you control another [Earth] creature, this has +2 / +0.

cards.name: Evolve Scales
cards.text: Give a creature +0 / +4 until the end of this turn.

cards.name: Savagery
cards.text: You may only cast this when you declare a counterattack. Give your creatures +2 / +0 until the end of this turn.

cards.name: Contact Poison
cards.text: Enchant a creature. It gains +2 / -1.

cards.name: Growth
cards.text: Enchant a creature. It gains +1 / +1. If it's an [Earth] creature, draw a card.

cards.name: Alarm Pheromone
cards.text: If you control an [Earth] creature, draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Recycle
cards.text: Destroy a creature. Your opponent adds the top card of their exile pile to their hand.

cards.name: Entangle
cards.text: Enchant a creature. It gains "cannot attack".

cards.name: Ironskin Runes
cards.text: Enchant a creature. It gains "whenever this would take damage, it takes 1 less".

cards.name: Sunlight
cards.text: At the end of each player's turn they draw a card.

cards.name: Pollinate
cards.text: <Search> for copies of all [Earth] creatures you control.

cards.name: Born From Ash
cards.text: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Select up to 1 [Earth] creature and summon it. Select up to 1 card and draw it. <Burn> any remaining cards.

cards.name: Earthen Reclamation
cards.text: If you control an [Earth] creature, destroy a permanent.

cards.name: Forest's Power
cards.text: Enchant a creature. It gains +3 / +3.

cards.name: Sprite's Blessing
cards.text: Enchant a creature. It gains +2 / +2. <Search> for all "sprite" creatures.

cards.name: Flower Crown
cards.text: Equip to a friendly creature. It becomes [Earth]. Draw a card.

cards.name: Living Spear
cards.text: Equip to a friendly creature. Equipped creature gains +1 / +0. When equipped creature is destroyed, summon a 1 / 1 [Earth] Living Spear creature token.

cards.name: Phial of Blight
cards.text: Equip to a friendly creature. After combat with an enemy creature, destroy this and the enemy creature.

cards.name: Fertiliser
cards.text: <Search> for an [Earth] enchantment. The next [Earth] enchantment you play this turn costs [Earth] less.

cards.name: Hexed Arrow
cards.text: You cannot play this and a creature on the same turn. Deal 1 damage to a creature, and if it takes damage destroy it.

cards.name: Chevaux de Frise
cards.text: At the start of your opponent's battle phase, you may select a friendly creature. It gains +1 / +1 and "cannot counterattack" until end of turn.

cards.name: Commander Adela
cards.text: When this enters the battlefield, and at the start of your turn, <burn> 1. If it's a [Fire] creature, summon it and give it <ready>.

cards.name: Erastas, The Phoenix
cards.text: Your [Fire] creatures have +1 / +0. When a friendly [Fire] non-token creature is destroyed, summon a 0 / 1 [Fire] Phoenix Wisp token with <ready>.

cards.name: Ember Sprite
cards.text: After you <burn> a card, you may switch it with this card from your hand.

cards.name: Magma Wyrm
cards.text: At the start of your turn, <burn> 1.

cards.name: Runed Champion
cards.text: When this is destroyed by combat damage, <search> for a [Fire] spell.

cards.name: Devoted Defender
cards.text: Your other creatures cannot be targeted with attacks.

cards.name: Fire Acolyte
cards.text: When this enters the battlefield, summon a 1 / 1 [Fire] Fire Worshipper token.

cards.name: Giant Salamander
cards.text: When this enters the battlefield, <burn> 1.

cards.name: Steamwork Mech
cards.text: Cannot attack unless your mana pool contains [Water].

cards.name: Pyromancer
cards.text: When this enters the battlefield, deal 1 damage to all creatures.

cards.name: Serpent of the Forge
cards.text: When this enters the battlefield, destroy an item.

cards.name: Untamed Fire Spirit
cards.text: When this enters the battlefield, deal 1 damage to a creature.

cards.name: Fire Warlock
cards.text: Whenever you play a card, <burn> 1.

cards.name: Reckless Stallion
cards.text: <Ready>.

cards.name: Fire Crystal
cards.text: Destroy a friendly creature to destroy an enemy creature.

cards.name: Hot Ash
cards.text: When a creature is destroyed, you may exile this from your hand to return the creature to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Arcane Artillery
cards.text: Cast when an enemy creature attacks. Destroy the creature.

cards.name: Dark Fire Sacrifice
cards.text: Cast when a creature attacks another creature. Destroy both creatures.

cards.name: Kindle
cards.text: <Ethereal>. Deal 1 damage to a creature to draw a card.

cards.name: Acceleration Runes
cards.text: Enchant a creature. It gains +1 / +1 and "<ready>".

cards.name: Burning Aura
cards.text: Enchant a creature. It becomes [Fire] and gains +1 / +1.

cards.name: Blood Sacrifice
cards.text: <Burn> 1 and draw a card.

cards.name: Electric Shock
cards.text: Cast when a creature attacks. Cancel the attack and set its attack to 0 until the end of this turn.

cards.name: Firebolt
cards.text: Deal 1 damage to a creature.

cards.name: Blaze
cards.text: Enchant a friendly [Earth] creature. It gains +2 / +1.

cards.name: Boil Blood
cards.text: Enchant a friendly [Water] creature. It becomes [Fire] and gains +2 / +0.

cards.name: Thunderstorm
cards.text: Spells that deal damage deal 1 additional damage.

cards.name: Incinerate
cards.text: Destroy a creature. Draw a card.

cards.name: Fireball
cards.text: Deal 3 damage to an enemy creature.

cards.name: Fireworks
cards.text: Deal 3 damage to enemy creatures, one at a time, split as you choose.

cards.name: Heat Wave
cards.text: Deal 1 damage to all enemy creatures. If you control a [Fire] creature, deal 2 instead.

cards.name: Summon
cards.text: <Burn> 1. If it's a [Fire] creature, summon it.

cards.name: Immolate
cards.text: Destroy all items equipped to a creature, then deal 2 damage to it.

cards.name: Greater Summon
cards.text: <Burn> 2. Summon any [Fire] creatures burned.

cards.name: Meteor Shot
cards.text: Deal 5 damage to an enemy creature, and 1 damage to all other enemy creatures.

cards.name: Fire Star Rising
cards.text: Creatures you control have +3 / +0.

cards.name: Blood to Fire
cards.text: Draw until you have 7 cards in hand or your deck is empty, then <burn> the rest of your deck. You cannot draw or <burn> cards.

cards.name: Runic Sabre
cards.text: Equip to a friendly Fire creature. Equipped creature gains +2 / +0.

cards.name: Alchemist's Fire
cards.text: Deal 2 damage to an enemy creature. If that destroys it, <burn> 1.

cards.name: Magician's Blade
cards.text: Equip to a friendly creature. Equipped creature gains +1 / +1 and "cannot be targeted by spells".

cards.name: Accelerant
cards.text: Equip to a friendly [Fire] creature. Double its attack and set its health to 1.

cards.name: Phoenix Feather
cards.text: Equip to a friendly creature. Equipped creature gains +1 / +1 and "when this creature is destroyed, resummon it". When this item is destroyed, <search> your deck for "Erastas, The Phoenix".

cards.name: Blazing Effigy
cards.text: At the start of your turn, if you control a [Fire] creature, destroy a friendly [Fire] creature and this to <burn> 3. Summon any [Fire] creatures.

cards.name: Lissa, Spirit of the Fountain
cards.text: At the start of your turn, <heal> 2.

cards.name: Novhu, The Kraken
cards.text: At the start of your turn, deal 2 damage to your opponent.

cards.name: Arcane Defender
cards.text: Your other creatures cannot be targeted with attacks.

cards.name: Water Sprite
cards.text: When your opponent declares an attack, you may summon this from your hand as the new target.

cards.name: Steam Surger
cards.text: If you pay for this with [Fire], this gains <ready>.

cards.name: Frozen Avenger
cards.text: When a friendly creature is destroyed, you may summon this from your hand.

cards.name: Kind Mermaid
cards.text: When this is destroyed, summon a 0 cost [Water] creature from your exile pile.

cards.name: Witch's Cat
cards.text: If you've cast a spell this turn, this costs nothing.

cards.name: Vengeful Mermaid
cards.text: When this enters the battlefield, destroy a damaged creature.

cards.name: Water Witch
cards.text: Once per turn, when a friendly creature would take damage you may reduce the damage to 0.

cards.name: Enchanted Seahorse
cards.text: When this enters the battlefield, <heal> 3.

cards.name: Herald of The Kraken
cards.text: When this enters the battlefield, <search> for "Novhu, The Kraken".

cards.name: Minor Healing
cards.text: <Heal> 1.

cards.name: Refresh
cards.text: Return a [Water] spell from your mana pool to your hand.

cards.name: Ray of Frost
cards.text: Deal 1 damage to a creature. It cannot attack this turn.

cards.name: Shield
cards.text: Cast when an enemy creature attacks. Reduce the attack's damage by 3.

cards.name: Freeze
cards.text: Enchant a creature. Set its attack to 0.

cards.name: Resistance
cards.text: Enchant a friendly creature. It gains +0 / +2.

cards.name: Absorb Life
cards.text: Destroy a creature. If it's a friendly creature, <heal> equal to its health.

cards.name: Geyser
cards.text: Deal 2 damage to all enemy creatures.

cards.name: Irrigate
cards.text: Draw a card for each [Water] creature you control.

cards.name: Restoration
cards.text: Cast when a friendly [Water] creature that costs 1 or less is destroyed. Resummon it.

cards.name: Protection from Energy
cards.text: Enchant a friendly creature. It gains "this takes no damage from spells and cannot be targeted by spells".

cards.name: Arcane Barrier
cards.text: When you would take damage, you may destroy this to take 0 damage instead.

cards.name: Regenerative Shielding
cards.text: Whenever you would exile cards due to damage, add the first to your mana pool instead.

cards.name: Rain
cards.text: [Water] creatures have +0 / +1.

cards.name: Snowstorm
cards.text: All creatures have -2 / -0. At the start of your turn destroy this, <search> for a [Water] field spell, and put it into play.

cards.name: Imprison
cards.text: Exile a creature.

cards.name: Inflict Wounds
cards.text: Deal 3 damage to a creature.

cards.name: Lesser Healing
cards.text: <Heal> 2. Draw a card.

cards.name: Liquefy
cards.text: Destroy a creature with 2 or less attack.

cards.name: Ocean's Grasp
cards.text: Destroy all creatures with 2 or less attack.

cards.name: Death Ward
cards.text: When you would die, you may destroy this to gain "you cannot die until the end of your next turn".

cards.name: Mage Armour
cards.text: Once per turn, you may reduce the damage of an attack targeting you by 2.

cards.name: Greater Healing
cards.text: <Heal> 3. Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Void
cards.text: Exile all creatures.

cards.name: Enchanted Trident
cards.text: Equip to a friendly creature. It gains +2 / +1. When the creature is destroyed, return this to your hand.

cards.name: Witch's Hat
cards.text: Equip to a friendly creature. It gains "whenever you cast a [Water] spell, draw a card".

cards.name: Holy Water
cards.text: Deal 2 damage to an enemy creature, and if this destroys it <heal> 2.

cards.name: Lissa's Tear
cards.text: Summon a [Water] creature with cost [Water] or less from your exile pile. <Search> for "Lissa, Spirit of the Fountain".

cards.name: Lian, Gem Of The South
cards.text: Your spells cost [Air] less. Whenever you cast a spell, draw a card.

cards.name: Mikael, Storm Lord
cards.text: When you channel cards, shuffle them into your deck instead of exiling them.

cards.name: Cloud Sprite
cards.text: When your opponent casts a spell with a target, you may summon this creature from your hand as the new target.

cards.name: Flying Snail
cards.text: Whenever this creature would take damage, it takes 1 less damage.

cards.name: Elemental Hawk
cards.text: This can attack twice each turn.

cards.name: Mischievous Monkey
cards.text: When this enters the battlefield your opponent discards a card at random.

cards.name: Arcane Elemental
cards.text: When this enters the battlefield, destroy a spell. If this enters the battlefield but does not destroy a spell, exile this card.

cards.name: Storm Mage
cards.text: Your [Air] spells cost [Air] less.

cards.name: Air Elemental
cards.text: If you've played an [Air] spell this turn, this costs [Air] less.

cards.name: Pegasus
cards.text: If you've played an [Air] spell this turn, this costs [Air] less.

cards.name: Dispel Magic
cards.text: Destroy a spell.

cards.name: Counterspell
cards.text: Cast when your opponent casts a spell. Channel [Any] equal to the spell's converted mana cost to counter it.

cards.name: Planar Redirection
cards.text: <Ethereal>. Cast when your opponent plays a creature. Exile it. They do not pay its mana cost

cards.name: Quicken Spell
cards.text: You may immediately cast a spell as though it had "instant" in reaction to this.

cards.name: Negate Magic
cards.text: When a spell is cast, you must destroy this to counter it.

cards.name: Overcast
cards.text: When this enters the battlefield, if it destroys an active field spell, draw a card.

cards.name: Barometric Pulse
cards.text: Deal 2 damage to all creatures except [Air] creatures.

cards.name: Disable
cards.text: Your opponent discards a card at random.

cards.name: Become Ethereal
cards.text: Enchant a creature. It gains "<ethereal>".

cards.name: Force Bindings
cards.text: Enchant a creature. It gains "cannot attack".

cards.name: Warding Runes
cards.text: Creatures cannot be summoned. At the end of your next turn, destroy this.

cards.name: Hurricane
cards.text: [Air] creatures have +1 / +0.

cards.name: Sandstorm
cards.text: When this enters the battlefield, destroy all other spells.

cards.name: Detonate
cards.text: Destroy a creature. No creatures can attack until the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Mana Drain
cards.text: <Ethereal>. Exile the top 2 cards of your opponent's mana pool.

cards.name: Thunderwave
cards.text: Deal 3 damage to all enemy creatures.

cards.name: Sealing Sigil
cards.text: Cards added to either player's mana pool are exiled instead.

cards.name: Updraught
cards.text: Your [Air] creatures have +1 / +0.

cards.name: Anti-Magic Field
cards.text: At the end of each player's turn, destroy all other spells.

cards.name: Air Talisman
cards.text: Play when one of your creatures is attacked. Cancel the attack. That creature cannot be targeted by attacks until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Bottled Storm
cards.text: Deal 1 damage to all creatures.

cards.name: Draught of the Storm Caller
cards.text: <Search> for "Mikael, Storm Lord". Take 2 damage.

cards.name: Mana Potion
cards.text: <Burn> 2.

cards.name: Prophet Valeriya
cards.text: Your opponent plays with their hand revealed. At the start of your turn you may shuffle any number of cards from your hand into your deck to draw that many cards.

cards.name: Lunar Squid
cards.text: When this enters the battlefield, <search> for a [Spirit] card.

cards.name: Spirit Sprite
cards.text: When this enters the battlefield, reveal a random card from your opponent's hand.

cards.name: Friendly Ghost
cards.text: When you play a card on your turn that costs at least [Spirit], you may summon this from your hand.

cards.name: Psychic Kitten
cards.text: When this enters the battlefield, reveal a random card from your opponent's hand.

cards.name: Mind Seer
cards.text: When this enters the battlefield, view your opponent's hand.

cards.name: Spirit Sage
cards.text: When this enters the battlefield, <search> for a [Spirit] card.

cards.name: Ancient Herald
cards.text: When this enters the battlefield, you may pay [Spirit] to <search> for a Hero.

cards.name: Locate Object
cards.text: Privately view the top 3 cards of your deck. You may reveal an item from among them to draw it. Put the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck.

cards.name: Scry
cards.text: Name a card. Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Draw any copies of the named card revealed. Put the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck.

cards.name: Sense Emotion
cards.text: Name an element. Reveal the top card of your opponent's deck. If it is the element you named, draw a card.

cards.name: Vision
cards.text: View your opponent's hand.

cards.name: Sprite Portal
cards.text: At the end of your turn, add all "sprite" creatures from your mana pool to your hand.

cards.name: Command
cards.text: Select a creature. It attacks a creature of your choice.

cards.name: Lunar Communion
cards.text: Privately view the top 3 cards of your deck. Draw 1 and put the others on the bottom of your deck.

cards.name: Sense Thoughts
cards.text: Name a card. View your opponent's hand. If their hand contains the named card, draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Mind Spike
cards.text: Cast when an enemy creature attacks you. Destroy it.

cards.name: Hold Person
cards.text: Enchant a creature. Set its attack to 0.

cards.name: Sleep
cards.text: The creature or creatures with the highest attack on the battlefield cannot attack.

cards.name: Power Word Kill
cards.text: Destroy a creature. This cannot be countered.

cards.name: Geas
cards.text: Name a non-Hero card. Your opponent cannot play cards with that name.

cards.name: Dominate Creature
cards.text: Enchant a creature. Take control of it.

cards.name: Time Stop
cards.text: Set aside your hand. Draw 3 cards. You may play any of the 3 cards without paying their costs. Discard any remaining cards then take your hand back. Your opponent may not activate card effects in reaction to cards played during this spell.

cards.name: Wish
cards.text: Exile all creatures. Discard your hand then draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Spirit Blade
cards.text: Equip to a friendly creature. It has +X / +0, where X is the amount of [Spirit] in your mana pool.

cards.text: Creatures take no damage from spells.

cards.text: Destroy all spells.

cards.name: Photosynthesis
cards.text: Restore all friendly [Earth] creatures to full health.

cards.name: Grasping Vine
cards.text: Select an item equipped to an enemy creature. Take control of it and equip it to a friendly creature.

cards.text: Your creatures have +0 / +2.

cards.text: Summon two 1 / 1 [Earth] Cow creature tokens.

cards.text: Whenever a creature you control is destroyed, draw a card.

cards.text: If you <burn> this card, summon it.

cards.text: Tokens have +1 / +0.

cards.text: When this deals damage to another creature in combat, destroy that creature.

cards.text: When this is destroyed, <search> for a [Water] spell.

cards.text: When this enters the battlefield, destroy an enemy creature with 2 or less attack.

cards.name: Sea Snake
cards.text: When this enters the battlefield, deal 1 damage to your opponent.

cards.name: Healing Touch
cards.text: Restore a friendly creature to full health.

cards.name: Relic of the Deep
cards.text: At the end of your turn, you may pay [Water] to return an enemy creature to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Aquamarine Tiara
cards.text: Equip to a creature. It gains +2 / +2 and <ethereal>.

cards.name: Horn of Reflection
cards.text: Summon two 0 / 1 [Water] Mirror Image creature tokens.

cards.name: Bracelet of Deflection
cards.text: Once per turn, when an enemy creature declares an attack, you may cancel the attack.

cards.name: Electric Sprite
cards.text: When this enters the battlefield, the next [Air] spell you play this turn costs [Air] less.

cards.name: Petal Dancer
cards.text: <Ready>. When this enters the battlefield, return an [Air] spell from your mana pool to your hand.

cards.name: Stormchaser
cards.text: When this is destroyed, <search> for an [Air] creature.

cards.name: Enraged Sky Serpent
cards.text: <Ready>. When your opponent destroys a spell you control, you may summon this from your hand.

cards.name: Disenchant
cards.text: Destroy an item to draw a card.

cards.name: Disorient
cards.text: Cast when your opponent plays a card. Cancel its effect and shuffle the card into your opponent's deck. They do not pay its mana cost.

cards.name: Lightning Bolt
cards.text: Deal 3 damage to an enemy creature.

cards.name: Seal Spells
cards.text: View your opponent's hand and select a card. Place it and a card from your hand face-down under this card. When this leaves the battlefield, return the cards to their owners' hands.

cards.name: Demonic Chain
cards.text: At the end of your turn, summon a [Fire] creature from your mana pool. Give it <ethereal>. When this card leaves the battlefield, exile all creatures summoned with this effect.

cards.name: Ring of Shielding
cards.text: Equip to a friendly creature. The first time it would take damage, destroy this to reduce the damage to 0.

cards.name: Pearl of Spell Storing
cards.text: <Ethereal>. <Search> for an [Air] spell. The next [Air] spell you cast this turn costs [Air] less.

cards.name: Magic Mirror
cards.text: Play when your opponent casts a spell with a target. Change its target a valid target of your choice.

cards.name: Astral Huntress
cards.text: Whenever an enemy creature is destroyed, <search> for a card.

cards.name: Summoning Stone
cards.text: Whenever you cast a spell, <search> for a 0-cost creature. Summon it.

cards.name: Oil of Etherealness
cards.text: Equip to a creature. It gains "<ethereal>".

cards.name: Will-o'-the-wisp
cards.text: When this is destroyed, <search> for a [Spirit] item.

cards.name: Mana Scavenger
cards.text: You can only play this card if you control a permanent spell.

cards.name: Animate Memory
cards.text: Your other creatures cannot be targeted with attacks. When this is destroyed, you may put it on the top of your deck.

cards.name: Mind Snake
cards.text: <Ethereal>. <Ready>. When this creature is destroyed, exile the top card of your opponent's mana pool.

cards.name: Mind Breaker
cards.text: When this enters the battlefield, name a non-Hero card. Your opponent must discard a copy of that card if they're holding one.

cards.name: Spirit Militia
cards.text: <Ethereal>.

cards.name: Manifest Dreams
cards.text: Privately view the top 3 cards of your deck. Summon them face down as 1 / 1 [Spirit] Dream creature tokens. When one is destroyed, add it to your hand.

cards.name: Bend Fate
cards.text: Privately view the top 3 cards of your opponent's deck and put them back in any order. Privately view the top 3 cards of your deck and put them back in any order.

cards.name: Detect Magic
cards.text: Your opponent reveals all instant spells in their hand. They cannot play instant spells until the end of this turn.

cards.name: Locate Creature
cards.text: Privately view the top 3 cards of your deck. You may reveal an creature from among them to draw it. Put the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck.

cards.name: Resurrection
cards.text: Summon a creature from your mana pool or exile pile.

cards.name: Mind Blank
cards.text: At the end of your turn, set aside the cards in your hand. At the start of your turn, shuffle the set aside cards into your deck and draw that many cards.

cards.name: Gate
cards.text: When this enters the battlefield, and at the start of your turn, you may summon a creature from your hand without paying its mana cost.

cards.name: Enthrall
cards.text: Your creatures cannot be targeted by attacks; enemy attacks must target you directly instead.

cards.name: Seal World Line
cards.text: <Search> for up to three cards. Do not reveal them, and place them face-down under this card. When this leaves the battlefield, shuffle the saved cards into your deck.

cards.name: Haunted Wine Glass
cards.text: At the start of your turn, you may destroy this to summon a [Spirit] creature with cost [Spirit] or less from your hand. Give it <ready>.

cards.name: Peek
cards.text: Reveal the top card of your opponent's deck. If it's a spell, draw a card.

cards.name: Spell Scroll
cards.text: <Ethereal>. <Search> for a [Spirit] spell.

cards.name: Smudge Stick
cards.text: Destroy all tokens and <ethereal> creatures.

cards.name: Ethereal Dagger
cards.text: <Ethereal>. Equip to a friendly creature. It gains +1 / +0 and "when this deals combat damage to a creature, that creature gains <ethereal> until the end of this turn".
